name: Tomba!
overview: From the creators of Mega Man, comes one of PlayStation's cult classic platformers, Tomba! The evil Koma Pigs have stolen Tomba's grandfather bracelet, but he won't sit idly by. Thus, Tomba will have to journey through an uncharted land to get the bracelet and, of course, give those nasty swines a taste of their own medicine. Bacon isn't just for breakfast anymore!
